message: Generated 4 comprehensive Cluster A personality disorder questions with clear differential diagnosis scenarios. Questions distinguish between Paranoid (distrust/suspicion), Schizoid (indifference to relationships), and Schizotypal (oddness/ideas of reference) disorders. Each includes detailed explanations of why other Cluster A disorders don't fit.

key_distinctions_covered: Motivation for social isolation (distrust vs indifference vs anxiety)
Ideas of reference in Schizotypal vs suspicious interpretations in Paranoid
Emotional presentation (flat affect in Schizoid vs anxiety in Schizotypal)
Differential diagnosis with psychotic disorders and other personality disorders
